Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage

Interface StorageView<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of resource
All Known Subinterfaces:
CompositeAwareChild<T>, CompositeStorage<T>, ConsumingStorage<T>, FuzzyStorageChannel<T>, LimitedStorage<T>, Storage<T>, StorageChannel<T>, TrackedStorage<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfiguredProxyStorage, AbstractImmutableConfiguredProxyStorage, AbstractProxyStorage, CompositeStorageImpl, ExternalStorage, FuzzyStorageChannelImpl, InMemoryStorageImpl, LimitedStorageImpl, StorageChannelImpl, TrackedStorageImpl
@API(status=STABLE, since="2.0.0-milestone.1.2") public interface StorageView<T>
Represents a storage where the contents can be retrieved.
